statements: SELECT * FROM energy_management;
SELECT equipment_id, device_id, device_name FROM energy_management WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_id, device_name, equipment_id FROM energy_management WHERE device_name LIKE '%controller%';
SELECT * FROM energy_management WHERE equipment_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT device_name, maintenance_details FROM energy_management WHERE maintenance_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_management WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, maintenance_date FROM energy_management WHERE device_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM energy_management WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT equipment_id, device_name FROM energy_management WHERE device_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM energy_management ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_name, device_location FROM devices;
SELECT device_name, last_service_date FROM devices WHERE device_location='Room A';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_name, maintenance_description FROM devices JOIN maintenance_logs ON devices.device_id = maintenance_logs.device_id;
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_name, device_location FROM devices WHERE device_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY device_location DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_location, last_service_date FROM devices WHERE last_service_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY device_name ASC;

SELECT devices.device_name, maintenance_logs.maintenance_date FROM devices JOIN maintenance_logs ON devices.device_id = maintenance_logs.device_id WHERE maintenance_logs.maintenance_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY maintenance_logs.maintenance_date DESC;

SELECT devices.device_name, COUNT(*) AS number_of_logs FROM devices JOIN maintenance_logs ON devices.device_id = maintenance_logs.device_id GROUP BY devices.device_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY number_of_logs DESC;
SELECT * FROM technicians;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM iot_devices;
SELECT maintenance_description, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_logs;
SELECT technician_name, technician_skill_level FROM technicians;
SELECT device_name, last_maintenance_date FROM iot_devices;
SELECT * FROM iot_devices WHERE last_maintenance_date > '2021-09-01';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM iot_devices WHERE device_type = 'sensor' ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_description LIKE '%battery%' AND technician_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;

SELECT device_id, device_name, technician_name FROM iot_devices JOIN maintenance_logs ON iot_devices.device_id = maintenance_logs.device_id JOIN technicians ON maintenance_logs.technician_id = technicians.technician_id ORDER BY device_id, maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT technician_name, technician_experience FROM technicians WHERE technician_skill_level > 3 ORDER BY technician_experience DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_name, installation_date FROM devices WHERE installation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_id, device_type FROM devices ORDER BY device_type DESC;
SELECT sensor_location, last_reading, sensor_type FROM sensors WHERE last_reading <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT sensor_id, reading_value, reading_timestamp FROM sensor_readings ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_name, installation_date FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Temperature Sensor';
SELECT device_name, maintenance_type FROM devices JOIN maintenance_logs ON devices.device_id = maintenance_logs.device_id WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance';
SELECT sensor_location, last_reading FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Pressure Sensor';

SELECT device_name, reading_value, reading_timestamp FROM devices JOIN sensors ON devices.device_id = sensors.device_id JOIN sensor_readings ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_readings.sensor_id WHERE reading_unit = 'kPa';
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM devices ORDER BY last_service DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, alert_type, alert_date FROM alerts WHERE alert_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT task_name, task_description, completed_date FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE completed_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, location, sensor_type FROM sensors WHERE installation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, alert_type, alert_date FROM alerts WHERE alert_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT sensor_id, task_name, scheduled_date FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE completed_date IS NULL ORDER BY scheduled_date DESC;
